title: 100 Crushes
description: 100 Crushes compiles five years of queer comics by Elisha Lim, including excerpts from Sissy , The Illustrated Gentleman , Queer Child in the Eighties , and their cult series 100 Butches , as well as new work. It's an absorbing documentary that travels through Toronto, Berlin, Singapore, and beyond in the form of interviews, memoirs, and gossip from an international queer vanguard. Toronto-based artist Elisha Lim 's work celebrates the dignity and power of being neither straight, nor white, nor cis-gendered. In 2011 they also successfully advocated for Canadian gay media to adopt the gender neutral pronoun "they."
author: Elisha Lim
